sentences.en: I think what screen dance will do, though, is heighten awareness of dance in general.
sentences.cn: 我认为荧屏舞蹈会在总体上提高人们对舞蹈的认知。

sentences.en: The campaign is intended to heighten public awareness of the disease.
sentences.cn: 这场运动的目的是使公众更加了解这种疾病。

sentences.en: But when the emotion that leads to stiffening the lip is more intense, and involves strong muscle tension, facial feedback may heighten emotional response.
sentences.cn: 但是当导致嘴唇僵硬的情绪变得更加强烈，并导致肌肉强烈绷紧时，面部表情反应就可能会增强情绪反应。
